abstract: DirecTV informed its customers of an impasse with the News Corporation on Thursday, and said that some of that company's cable channels could be blacked out on Nov. 1.
snippet: DirecTV informed its customers of an impasse with the News Corporation on Thursday, and said that some of that company's cable channels could be blacked out on Nov. 1.

headline.main: DirecTV and News Corp. at Odds Over Fees
